recipes.label: Try to Sell a jumble of Trappings
recipes.startdescription: Just because something has use, does not mean it has value. I cannot sell these trappings, since they carry no inherent shine or appeal.

recipes.label: Sell Off An Item of Great Value
recipes.startdescription: Items that are truely remarkable will always find a buyer.
recipes.description: We have found a price we both agree on.
